snippet: Readers including Christopher B. Nelson of St. John’s College respond to a column by David Brooks.
abstract: Letter from Christopher B Nelson, St John's College president, responds to May 2 David Brooks Op-Ed column on dangers posed by focus on utilitarianism at the expense of big ideas.
lead_paragraph: Readers including Christopher B. Nelson of St. John’s College respond to a column by David Brooks.

headline.main: The Fervor for Great Books and Big Ideas Isn’t Dead
headline.print_headline: The Fervor for Great Books and Big Ideas Isn’t Dead
